title: Accessing Advance Data
htmlContent:
Accessing Advance Data

In the previous learn basic section we learnt about accessing the data based upon the user service, In this tutorial application we need to access the data based upon other services which require custom business logic.

Here we consider an example of LoginService which is used to send a post request while performing authentication on the entity, here we will manage the login activity based upon the custom business logic which is written in the service class.

This service will be used after injecting it into the component class of the login component
